entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 40%
